main.greeting1: Fatodo helps not to forget about important
main.greeting2: and to work in a team

bullets.title1: Like a social network, but fo achieving goals
bullets.text1: Create task lists, share them, and discuss their fulfillment in comments and chat rooms.
bullets.text2: A convenient alert system with the possibility of notifications by e-mail will remind you of important dates and events.
bullets.text3: You choose what tasks to do in the first place, and you will not get down.

cards1.title: It's time to do the best
cards1.bullet1: Create task lists for yourself and plan your day as efficiently as possible.
cards1.bullet2: Share tasks and do them faster together with friends and colleagues.
cards1.bullet3: Exchange ideas in comments and messages, find effective ways to achieve your goals.

cards2.title: Easy and understandable interface
cards2.bullet1: It was never so easily to handle task lists.
cards2.bullet3: Control the execution using the reminder system.
cards2.text: All the most important will always remain before your eyes.

cards3.title: Mobile app is coming soon...
cards3.text: Soon the Fatodo assistant will become even more affordable, always in your pocket!
